channel.title: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mZ1VE.png[/img][/CENTER] [IMG]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [B]www.youtube.com/user/TheRs317[/B] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][b] www.RS-317.net[/b] [IMG]http://www.theforce.net/2011/twitter_favicon.png[/img][B] www.twitter.com/RS_317 [/B] [B]Make sure to keep posted on this thread for frequent updates to Rs317! [FONT=century gothic] [B]Table of Contents[/B][/FONT] [ul][li][URL=http://"http://rune-server.org/3183748-post1.html"][FONT=century gothic]Update list[/FONT][/URL][/li] [li][URL=http://"http://google.com/3183750-post3.html"][FONT=century gothic]Media[/FONT][/URL][/li] [li][URL=http://"http://google.com/3183749-post2.html"][FONT=century gothic]Info[/FONT][/URL][/li][/ul] [FONT=century gothic]The [B]red[/B] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [B]orange[/B] color code means the feature has been started but is not yet completed. The [B]green[/B] color code means the feature has been completed.[CENTER] [IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3] [B]Random Events[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
Genie Drunken dwarf Ent tree Explosive mining rocks Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie More to come...
[center] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3][B]Combat[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[FONT=Century Gothic]PvP fully complete[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]PvN fully complete[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Perfect max hit formulas[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Perfect accuracy formula[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Every weapon special attack[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Equipment requirements[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Degradable equipment[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Weapon poisoning[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Magic[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Every modern combat spell[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Every ancient combat spell[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can't mage through walls[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Charge w/ godspells[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Weakening spells[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Every other spell including:[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]B2b/B2p[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Charging staff heads[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Alching/Superheat[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Enchanting jewelry[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XtDgo.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Range[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Bows/arrows[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Crossbows (the regular one and karil's)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can't shoot through walls[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Prayer[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All bones bury-able[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Every prayer working properly[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Zombie and shade random event[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vqkjD.jpg[/img] [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][B]Mining[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Emptying and refilling rocks[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All ores can be mined[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Prospecting[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Random chance of obtaining gems[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Rock golem random event[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pry55.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Smithing[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All bars can be made[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All bars can be forged into items[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All equipment can be produced[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Fishing[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All fish can be caught[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct item requirements[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fishing spots located all around the world[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Moving fishing locations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]River troll random event[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NwQKR.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Cooking[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All fish can be cooked[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All meats can be cooked[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Grinding wheat into flour[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Cakes[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Pies[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Potatoes (with toppings)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Pizza[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Stew[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Drinks[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Dairy churn[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Gnome cooking[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Brew making[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Misc. cooking recepies[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct burning formula[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Cooking gauntlets[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Lumbridge cooking range bonus[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Eating food (in pieces)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animation and timing used[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Woodcutting[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Stumps and regrowing trees[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct hatchet finding[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct hatchet animations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All trees cut-able[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct fell chance algorithms[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Birds nest falling out[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Evil tree spirit random event[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Firemaking[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All logs light able[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]colored fires[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]"Backward" firelighting[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Clipped[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Agility[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Gnome, Wilderness[/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic], [/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic]Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All obstacles[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Brimhaven Minigame[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Force movement mask[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations used[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Herblore[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Herb Identifying[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All potions can be made[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Thieving[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct animations and graphics used[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Crafting[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Cutting gems[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Making amulets, necklaces, and rings[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Stringing amulets and necklaces[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Crafting normal, hard, and dragon hide[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Crafting snakeskin[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Spinning wool and flax[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Attaching studs[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ESaGB.jpg[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Runecrafting[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Use of the Abyss[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All altars working[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct multiple crafting[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Use of Pouches included[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Talismans "pull" to altars[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Tiaras enchanting[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Mixing runes[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/blvDn.jpg[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Fletching[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All logs can be fletched[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can string bows[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Can make arrows[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kKiOY.jpg[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Slayer[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]All slayer masters[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Slayer gem working[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]All equipment working[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Correct requirements for slayer monsters[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Farming[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
Allotments All vegetables working Correct crop timings Flowers All flowers and their effects working Correct flower timings Herbs All herbs working Correct herbs timings Hops All hops working Correct hops timings Fruit Trees All fruit trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct fruit tree growth timings Trees All trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct tree growth timings Gardeners Watch over crops working Correct payments per type of crop Compost Bin Supercompost making Compost making Bushes berries regrowing after being picked Correct bush timings All bushes working Tool Leprechaun Store items working Swaps noted items All farming patches working Correct disease chance algorithm Special plants All tools working Magic secateurs
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=4][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kq1sc.jpg[/img] [SIZE=3]Minigames[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Dueling Arena[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Castle Wars[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fight Caves[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fight Pits[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Barrows[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Magic Arena[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Pest Control[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fishing Trawler[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Gnome Ball[/FONT] Fishing Trawler Gnome Ball Bar crawl Blast Furnace Champion's Challenge Chompy hunting Games room Jungle Clean Up Pet Care Rogue Trader Tzhaar Caves Rogue's Den Splitbark Armour Temple Trekking [FONT=Century Gothic]Magic training arena[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Ranging Guild[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic] [SIZE=2][SIZE=3][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7DID9.gif[/img] Music/Sounds[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]Get music/sound packets[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]Get music/sound playing[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]All areas have music[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]All sounds added[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=3] [B]Quests[/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][color=orange]Tutorial Island[/color] [color=green]Black Knights' Fortress[/color] [color=green]Cook's Assistant[/color] [color=green]Demon Slayer[/color] [color=green] Dwarf Cannon[/color] [color=green]Ernest the Chicken[/color] [/SIZE][/FONT]

item.title: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present
item.dc:creator: @InsidiaX InsidiaX
item.description:
@InsidiaX wrote:

The Wanderer:

I’d like to see a benchmark out of curiosity. Good luck, nevertheless.

timeTaken: 155 timeTaken: 154 timeTaken: 155 timeTaken: 150 timeTaken: 154 timeTaken: 149 timeTaken: 147 timeTaken: 151 timeTaken: 166 timeTaken: 150 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 167 timeTaken: 156 timeTaken: 150 timeTaken: 150 timeTaken: 157 timeTaken: 149 timeTaken: 148 timeTaken: 155 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 157 timeTaken: 155 timeTaken: 162 timeTaken: 156 timeTaken: 157 timeTaken: 159 timeTaken: 159 timeTaken: 163 timeTaken: 153 timeTaken: 149 timeTaken: 162 timeTaken: 164 timeTaken: 153 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 156 timeTaken: 157 timeTaken: 154 timeTaken: 190 timeTaken: 148 timeTaken: 147 timeTaken: 151 timeTaken: 157 timeTaken: 159 timeTaken: 158 timeTaken: 149 timeTaken: 159 timeTaken: 156 timeTaken: 151 timeTaken: 155 timeTaken: 148 timeTaken: 151 timeTaken: 161 timeTaken: 150 timeTaken: 149 timeTaken: 153 timeTaken: 148 timeTaken: 161 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 147 timeTaken: 153 timeTaken: 146 timeTaken: 151 timeTaken: 154 timeTaken: 145 timeTaken: 148 timeTaken: 154 timeTaken: 152 timeTaken: 147 timeTaken: 150

That is server tickspeed, baring in mind, RSPS aim to keep within a 600MS tick cycle, we had 2000 Bots on during this test, all sending random packets.
Also i’d like to point out that where these are pretty decent results, we have improved our core by a great deal since these results.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Hyperion uses Netty??? Where did you learn your facts. PI uses MINA. LOL

What the fuck are you talking about? I just downloaded Hyperion & Project Insanity, they both use Mina.

RiiPiiNFtW:

NIO/IO is way better then Netty. Read up or have a sophisticated conversation with sinisoul.

Wrong again. You’re making yourself look more and more like an idiot. You clearly have no idea what you’re talking about.

Netty is based around Java NIO & IO is garbage.

EDIT: Also, Mina is not better than Netty, once you actually get inside and know how to properly implement Netty, you will see the differences.
Mina is also extremely out-dated, while Netty is still frequently updated.

Read full topic
item.source: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present

item.title: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present
item.dc:creator: @InsidiaX InsidiaX
item.description:
@InsidiaX wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:25, topic:439771”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=542463.msg3976159#msg3976159 date=1334687525]

Anyone here remember how RuneSource kicked Hyperions ass in terms of speed and (possibly) stability? I guess not. Protip: Mina sucks ass. Netty does not.

But the difference will change greatly after adding content because RuneSource wasn’t meant to handle tons of content. I don’t understand why you people think netty is the best, or at least think it’s better than Mina.
[/quote]

It’s already been proven Netty is better then Mini… One of the reasons Hyperion doesn’t test well is because of Mini…[/quote]

Everything you said, but Mina*

Read full topic
item.source: Rs317 - Re-living the past; In the Present
